duties_responsibilities.duty: Champion continuous delivery and assist teams through the transition to a rapid deployment model.
Propose, share, and refine best practices on release engineering, containerization, environment management, and scripting.
Design new applications and build transition approaches for existing ones, including architectural reviews and hands-on refactoring of stacks.
Advance and refine the use of Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) and link it to success in the CI/CD space.
Act as a change agent, proactively seeking out clarifications, problems, and misunderstandings to lead the transition process.
